Good news - We're looking to add a Sr. BA to the team! Let's talk!
Assistant Director of IT, Product Owner

• Served as Lead BA in building DriveTime's proprietary CRM solution from the ground up• Subject matter expert for all retail related systems (POS, CRM, credit scoring, accounting, underwriting, etc.)• Highest tier support for escalated retail system issues and outages• Responsible for mentoring newer Business Analysts• Helped streamline Business Analysis practices within an Agile/Scrum development methodology

• Transcend business & IT to design technology based and process solutions• Experience in acquisition/company mergers• Manage multiple 3rd party partner relations and integrated API's• Lead Business Analyst on integrating a 3rd party eSign solution within our proprietary POS system. • Experience in change management with an emphasis on introducing new technologies in place of legacy systems• Responsible for legal and IT compliance requests• Experience in large data migrations• Serve as the source matter expert for all retail systems and any related support

• Create and execute component, UAT, and regression based testing throughout the SDLC• Serve as an approver in company wide software deployments• Worked closely with complex database testing utilizing SSMS• Experience in WCF web service testing through the use of test clients.• Serve as an escalated resource for all retail systems support

• Analyze systems and business process to identify areas of opportunity• Administer all of DriveTime's proprietary and 3rd party applications• Support core development teams in their efforts• Experienced in company wide, time sensative downtime protocol

• Identify, build, and integrate trainings to develop organizational behaviors• Create and manage internal Wiki sites using SharePoint• Manage employee performance metrics• Responsible for all retail corporate communications• Served as project manager in various retail initiatives
• Responsible for creating & maintaining an electronic repository for invoicing• Office administration responsibilities

recommendations: June 27, 2014, Brian worked with Tamar in different groups

I worked closely with Tamar during DriveTime's largest branding revamp in the company's history - which consisted heavily of inventory enhancements.Tamar was heavily involved with this change from an inventory perspective. Our paths crossed numerous times throughout the project, but it was Tamar's work ethic and accessibility that made working with her such a pleasure.She was quick to collaborate and always had an answer to my never ending questions.In my experience, Tamar is very competent and reliable in her outputs. I could always count on her to follow through no matter how big or small the task at hand presented itself.
